-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema mydb
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `items_menu`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `items_menu` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nombre` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `precio` REAL NOT NULL,
  `tipo` ENUM('COMIDA', 'BEBIDA') NOT NULL,
  `imagen` text NOT NULL,
  `tipo_imagen` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `pedidos`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `pedidos` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `idItemMenu` INT NOT NULL,
  `nromesa` INT NOT NULL,
  `comentarios` LONGTEXT NULL,
  `fechaAlta` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `fk_item_idx` (`idItemMenu` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_item`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idItemMenu`)
    REFERENCES `items_menu` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
